Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a device that allows people to communicate over a distance using sound.
The student can show the string telephone connecting two students, demonstrating how it sends sound over a distance.
The student can include elements in the drawing that indicate the use of sound, such as vibrations or sound waves, traveling through the string.
The student can demonstrate, through the drawing, that the device can both send and receive sound information.
The student can show the use of only simple materials, typically used in a string telephone like cups and string, in the illustration.
The student can use the drawing to explain how the string telephone works and why it helps people communicate over distances.
